description: Midway University’s Master of Business Administration (MBA) degree program is designed to prepare students for leadership roles in today’s rapidly-changing, technology-driven global marketplace. The program provides the foundational business administration knowledge all leaders need. Our unique delivery model allows students to choose their area of concentration so they can customize their degree and meet their career goals. Courses are delivered in a unique 8-week format that allows a student to focus on just two courses at a time. The program is offered 100% online making it convenient for working professionals to earn their degree. Students can complete their degree in just 15 months.
Accreditation status: The MBA program at Midway University has received specialized accreditation for its business programs through the International Accreditation Council for Business Education (IACBE) located at 11960 Quivira Road, Suite 300 in Overland Park, Kansas, USA.

Concentration name: Initial Certification, Additional Certification, Teacher Leader Master of Education, Instructional Coach Endorsement, Literacy Specialist Endorsement (P-12)
description: Midway University’s Master of Education (M.Ed.) program is a 100% online program designed for individuals who have a bachelor’s degree and want to become a teacher or for current teachers who want to enhance their skills. The M.Ed. has two tracks for students – Initial Certification or an Additional Certification. Midway’s M.Ed. program is built upon the framework of the Kentucky Teacher Standards. The Initial Certification track is for individuals who have a bachelor’s degree in a field other than education and would like to become a certified teacher in Kentucky. The Additional Certification track is for certified teachers who wish to add to their teaching certificate. The Additional Certification track includes the Teacher Leader M.Ed. and various endorsements.
Accreditation status: Midway University is accredited by the Southern Association of Colleges and Schools Commission on Colleges (SACSCOC). The Teacher Education programs are accredited by the Council for the Accreditation of Educator Preparation (CAEP) and the Kentucky Education Professional Standards Board (EPSB).

description: Midway University's Master of Science in Nursing (MSN) degree program is designed to prepare innovative, collaborative nursing leaders. Midway's MSN program can open the door to advanced positions in nursing administration or nursing education. The program is offered in a 100% online format. Midway's MSN program is accredited by the Accreditation Commission for Education in Nursing (ACEN). Students can choose from two specialized tracks – Nursing Administration or Nursing Education.
Accreditation status: The master’s nursing program at Midway University located in Midway, KY is accredited by the: Accreditation Commission for Education in Nursing (ACEN) 3390 Peachtree Road NE, Suite 1400 Atlanta, GA 30326 (404) 975-5000. The most recent accreditation decision made by the ACEN Board of Commissioners for the master’s nursing program is Continuing Accreditation.

description: Midway University’s Master of Social Work (MSW) degree program is designed to prepare students for advanced social work practice. The program emphasizes the values and ethics of the social work profession and prepares graduates to work with individuals, families, groups, organizations, and communities. The mission of the Midway University MSW Program is to prepare graduate students for excellence in advanced social work practice through an innovative curriculum that embodies the values and ethics of the profession. The MSW Program will meet the needs of the community and the Commonwealth of Kentucky by developing leaders who are committed to social and economic justice and the well-being of all persons. The MSW program is offered 100% online.
Accreditation status: The Midway University Master of Social Work program is accredited by the Council on Social Work Education’s Board of Accreditation.

Concentration name: Middle School English, Middle School Math, Middle School Science, Middle School Social Studies, Secondary English, Secondary Math, Secondary Social Studies, P-12 Art, P-12 Music, P-12 Physical Education and Health, P-12 Spanish
description:
The Master of Art in Teaching (MAT) program is an alternate route to teacher certification in Kentucky. The program is specifically designed for those individuals who have a bachelor’s degree in a field other than education and want to become a teacher. Through our MAT program, students can complete the requirements for a master’s degree and initial teacher certification at the same time.

Our MAT program is a 30-36 credit hour program that includes 16 weeks of student teaching in a classroom. We focus on classroom management, planning and assessment, diverse and exceptional learners, and literacy and technology to ensure our candidates are prepared for today’s classrooms. Throughout the program, our students have multiple opportunities to be in a variety of school settings to gain the experience they need.
Accreditation status: Midway University’s teacher education programs are accredited by the Council for the Accreditation of Educator Preparation (CAEP) and approved by the Kentucky Education Professional Standards Board (EPSB).

description: Midway’s Master of Science in Management Information Systems (MMIS) program provides an in-depth understanding of the critical role that information systems play in modern organizations. Students will gain the skills and knowledge needed to manage and leverage information technology to achieve business goals and objectives. The program emphasizes the development of technical and analytical skills, as well as the ability to effectively communicate and collaborate with stakeholders at all levels of an organization. This degree is 100% online.
Program name: Master of Science in Management Information Systems (MMIS)

description: This dual master’s degree is designed for nurses who want to pursue leadership roles in healthcare organizations. In the business world, a Master of Business Administration (MBA) is the gold standard for those who want to lead and manage. The healthcare industry is in need of leaders with business acumen and advanced nursing training. This dual degree combines our MBA program with our Master of Science in Nursing (MSN) with a concentration in Administration. This program can be completed in just two years and is offered 100% online. Graduates are prepared for a variety of nursing leadership positions in a wide range of healthcare settings.
Accreditation status: The master’s degree program in nursing at Midway University are accredited by the Accreditation Commission for Education in Nursing (ACEN). The most recent accreditation decision made by the ACEN Board of Commissioners for the master’s degree program in nursing is Continuing Accreditation. The MBA program at Midway University is accredited through the International Accreditation Council for Business Education (IACBE).
Program name: Online Master of Science in Nursing-Master of Business Administration dual degree (online MSN-MBA dual degree)

description: The Master of Healthcare Administration (MHA) degree program at Midway University is designed to prepare individuals for careers in the healthcare industry. Our online format allows working professionals to earn their degree while maintaining their current employment. This 33 credit hour program can be completed in just 15 months. The MHA program provides students with the skills and knowledge needed to become effective healthcare administrators. Students will study topics such as healthcare finance, healthcare law and ethics, healthcare information systems, healthcare quality management, and healthcare strategic planning. The program will prepare students to be leaders and managers in hospitals, clinics, long-term care facilities, and other healthcare organizations. With a Master of Healthcare Administration degree, students will be prepared to make a positive impact on the lives of others. All graduate courses are taught in an accelerated format. The 16-week semester is broken down into two, 8-week terms. All graduate courses are 3 credit hours and taken one at a time.

The Human Resource Management concentration is designed for those seeking to enhance their knowledge of strategic staffing, compensation and benefits, and employee and labor relations within organizations. Course work prepares students for the Society for Human Resource Management Certified Professional (SHRM-CP) exam.
Accreditation status: The business programs at Midway University have received specialized accreditation through the International Accreditation Council for Business Education (IACBE) located at 11960 Quivira Road in Overland Park, Kansas, USA.

description: Midway’s Master of Business Administration (MBA) program is designed to prepare students for leadership roles in today’s rapidly-changing, global marketplace. The program addresses the needs of individuals with business or non-business undergraduate degrees. Offered 100% online, our MBA is affordable and flexible for working professionals who wish to advance their careers. The core curriculum provides students with a strong foundation in all business areas including leadership, management, accounting, finance, marketing, and strategy. Students can choose to further specialize their degree with a concentration. The Management Information Systems concentration is designed for students who want to become leaders in the technology field. Coursework addresses key areas of information systems management including information security, project management, business intelligence, and IT infrastructure. This degree is ideal for those individuals wanting to learn how to leverage technology to help an organization achieve its strategic goals.
Accreditation status: The MBA, as well as the undergraduate business programs, at Midway University are accredited by the Accreditation Council for Business Schools and Programs (ACBSP).

description: The MBA with a concentration in Sport Management is a 30 credit hour online program that prepares students for leadership positions in the sport industry. The curriculum is designed to integrate core business principles with the unique needs and challenges of the sport industry. Students will learn about sport marketing, law, finance, and event management, and will have the opportunity to apply their knowledge through real-world case studies and projects. This program can be completed in just 12-15 months. Coursework focuses on providing students a solid foundation of business management with specialized coursework in sport administration. This program is for students who want to become leaders in the field of sport management. Our graduates are prepared to work in a variety of sport-related organizations, including professional sports teams, college athletic departments, sports marketing firms, and community recreation programs. They are also well-equipped to pursue advanced degrees in sport management or related fields.
Accreditation status: The MBA program is accredited by the International Accreditation Council for Business Education (IACBE) located at 11960 Quivira Road in Overland Park, Kansas, USA.

description: The Tourism and Event Management concentration is for those students who desire to work in the tourism and event management fields. According to the U.S. Bureau of Labor Statistics, employment of meeting, convention, and event planners is projected to grow 18 percent from 2021 to 2031, much faster than the average for all occupations. About 15,900 openings for meeting, convention, and event planners are projected each year, on average, over the decade. This concentration helps prepare students for this growing industry. The Tourism and Event Management concentration is delivered in a convenient 100% online format. Students will take three specialized courses to earn this concentration in addition to their MBA core courses. The three courses are MGT 630 - Tourism and Event Management, MKT 610 - Hospitality and Event Marketing, and MGT 635 - Event Operations and Management.
Accreditation status: The MBA program and its concentrations are accredited by the Southern Association of Colleges and Schools Commission on Colleges (SACSCOC). Additionally, Midway’s business programs are accredited by the International Accreditation Council for Business Education (IACBE).
Program name: Concentration in Tourism and Event Management (MBA)

description: Midway University’s Master of Business Administration (MBA) in Health Care Administration program is designed for students who desire a career or want to advance their career in health care management. The health care industry is rapidly growing and is one of the largest employers in the U.S. There is a need for highly educated and well-trained health care managers and leaders. The MBA in Health Care Administration prepares students to work in various settings such as hospitals, clinics, nursing homes and other related organizations. The program focuses on critical health care topics such as health care finance, health care policies, quality management, health care operations, and electronic medical records. Students will also gain a deep understanding of core business concepts.
Accreditation status: Our MBA program is accredited by the Southern Association of Colleges and Schools Commission on Colleges (SACSCOC). In addition, our MBA program holds a specialized accreditation from the International Accreditation Council for Business Education (IACBE).

description: Our MBA with a concentration in Equine Studies is one of the signature programs at Midway University. The program is designed for individuals who desire to become leaders in the equine industry. This unique MBA program builds upon our nationally recognized undergraduate equine programs and allows individuals to continue their education with a strong business foundation in our MBA core courses combined with a focus on the equine industry in the concentration courses. Students will integrate business principles with the specific needs of the equine industry. Core courses will focus on management, finance, marketing and strategy. Concentration courses will focus on the business of the equine industry, equine marketing, equine law, and other special topics.
Accreditation status: Our MBA, Health Care Administration, and Sport Management programs are accredited by the International Accreditation Council for Business Education (IACBE).

description: The Nursing Administration concentration provides students with the leadership and management skills required to become a nurse administrator in various health care settings. This online program prepares graduates to manage the delivery of nursing and health care services across diverse health care settings.
Accreditation status: The Master of Science in Nursing program at Midway University is accredited by the Accreditation Commission for Education in Nursing (ACEN).

description: This concentration prepares nurses for faculty roles in various nursing education programs, as well as for staff development positions in health care facilities. This program meets the educational requirements for the National League for Nursing’s Certified Nurse Educator (CNE) credential.
Accreditation status: The Master of Science in Nursing program at Midway University is accredited by the Accreditation Commission for Education in Nursing (ACEN), 3390 Peachtree Road NE, Suite 1400, Atlanta, GA 30326, 404.975.5000.
